name: Paramount Pizzas
description:
First game I have created. A world where food is controlled by vegans, your pizza business is the last one standing. Deliver the pizzas to the destination and avoid the watchmen, Don't forget to pick up your fries along the way!

Arrow keys / Joystick on controller to move the character.

'R' to reset the level.

"World Vice" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Wepa" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Voltaic" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Vicious" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Pop Goes the Weasel" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Miami Nights - Extended Theme" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Long Time Coming" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Club Seamus" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
